00008 #include "settings.h"
00009 #include <getopt.h>
00010 #include <QDebug>
00011 
00013 Settings global_settings;
00014 
00016 void Settings::usage()
00017 {
00018     qWarning() <<
00019     "Usage: srtm2wayinfo [OPTION]...\n"
00020     "Add information about altitude differences to OSM data.\n"
00021     "By default data is read from stdin and output goes to stdout.\n\n"
00022     
00023     "Example: bzcat planet.osm.bz2 | srtm2wayinfo | bzip2 > altitude.osm.bz2\n\n"
00024     
00025     "Mandatory arguments to long options are mandatory for short options too.\n"
00026     "  -s, --srtm-server=URL      Changes the SRTM server's location.\n"
00027     "                                You need to delete the cache dir first.\n"
00028     "  -i, --input=FILE           Read data from file (default: stdin)\n"
00029     "  -o, --output=FILE          Write data to file (default: stdout)\n"
00030     "  -k, --keep                 Keep uncompressed SRTM tiles on disk\n"
00031     "                                (uses more diskspace but less cpu time)\n"
00032     "  -c, --cache=DIRECTORY      Directory in which the downloaded SRTM tiles\n"
00033     "                                are cached.\n"
00034     "  -S, --size=SIZE            Optimize data structures for a certain\n"
00035     "                                size of the dataset. SIZE can be\n"
00036     "                                - \"small\" (default, best for files < 300 MB)\n"
00037     "                                - \"medium\" (300 MB - 2 GB)\n"
00038     "                                - \"large\" (> 2 GB)\n";
00039 }
00040 
00046 void Settings::parseSettings(int argc, char **argv)
00047 {
00048     static struct option long_options[] =
00049             {
00050             {"srtm-server", required_argument, 0, 's'},
00051             {"input",       required_argument, 0, 'i'},
00052             {"output",      required_argument, 0, 'd'},
00053             {"cache",       required_argument, 0, 'c'},
00054             {"keep",        no_argument,       0, 'k'},
00055             {"help",        no_argument,       0, 'h'},
00056             {"size",        required_argument, 0, 'S'},
00057             {0, 0, 0, 0}
00058             };
00059     while (1) {
00060         int option_index = 0;
00061         int c = getopt_long(argc, argv, "s:i:o:kzS:", long_options, &option_index);
00062         if (c == -1) break;
00063         switch (c) {
00064             case 0:
00065                 break;
00066             case '?':
00067                 usage();
00068                 exit(1);
00069                 break;
00070             case 's':
00071                 srtm_server = optarg;
00072                 qDebug() << "Using SRTM server at" << srtm_server;
00073                 break;
00074             case 'i':
00075                 input = optarg;
00076                 break;
00077             case 'o':
00078                 output = optarg;
00079                 break;
00080             case 'c':
00081                 cache_dir = optarg;
00082                 break;
00083             case 'k':
00084                 store_uncompressed = true;
00085                 break;
00086             case 'h':
00087                 usage();
00088                 exit(0);
00089                 break;
00090             case 'S':
00091                 if (!strcasecmp(optarg, "large")) {
00092                     size = size_large;
00093                 } else if (!strcmp(optarg, "medium")) {
00094                     size = size_medium;
00095                 } else if (!strcmp(optarg, "small")) {
00096                     size = size_small;
00097                 } else {
00098                     qWarning() << "Size must be either \"small\", \"medium\" or \"large\"";
00099                     usage();
00100                     exit(1);
00101                 }
00102                 break;
00103             default:
00104                 qCritical() << "Unhandled option" << c;
00105         }
00106     }
00107     if (optind < argc) {
00108         qCritical() << "Too many arguments.";
00109         //Some arguments left
00110         usage();
00111         exit(1);
00112     }
00113 }
